body_html: I changed their ResNet to use Fused and it is now down to ~105ms which is aligned with the other platforms. I also checked the accuracy at 42 epochs (that seems to be what they are doing) and it is ~79% which seems to line up with the previous results. I am pretty sure they are using NHWC so there might be a small gain moving to NCHW but given the step times are close to the other platforms I am not sure I would mess with it for CIFAR-10. I think this is extra closed at this point. I am trying to find time to send a PR to the HK team.

body: I changed their ResNet to use Fused and it is now down to ~105ms which is aligned with the other platforms.  I also checked the accuracy at 42 epochs (that seems to be what they are doing) and it is ~79% which seems to line up with the previous results.  I am pretty sure they are using NHWC so there might be a small gain moving to NCHW but given the step times are close to the other platforms I am not sure I would mess with it for CIFAR-10.  I think this is extra closed at this point.  I am trying to find time to send a PR to the HK team.
